result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Howard Joshua Gillon

records.addlTxt:
All previous bail conditions are to remain the same. 
Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 at 8:30 am for status of counsel.

Defendant Howard Joshua Gillon appeared by video.  Attorney Amanda Poznanski in court for Howard Joshua Gillon.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a return on warrant.  Court reinstated $1,000.00 PR bond and all previous bail conditions remain the same.
Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Dean Sopcic appeared with the defendant.  There is a felony bench warrant.  Defendant taken into custody.  Case is scheduled for a return on warrant on 10-19-22 at 8:30 am in Br. 10.
Return on warrant scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Howard Joshua Gillon not in court.  Attorney Claire E Zyber in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Defendant does not appear.  Court issued a bench warrant for the defendant's arrest. This is a felony bench warrant.  REMAND BACK TO JUDGE. 
Court forfeited $1,000.00 PR Bond.
All previously ordered conditions of bail remain.

Defendant Howard Joshua Gillon in court. Colleen Cullen appearing as a friend of the court. Prosecuting attorney Samuel Tyler Tabin in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference on 10-14-2022 at 01:30 PM, Branch 10.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Howard Joshua Gillon not in court.  Attorney Claire E Zyber in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant does not appear.  Court issued a bench warrant.  REMAND BACK TO COMMISSIONER. Court ordered $1,000.00 PR bond forfeifted.

Defendant Howard Joshua Gillon appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Preliminary Hearing.  No attorney has been appointed yet.  Case is adjourned to 10-10-22 at 1:30 pm for status of counsel by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report, filed.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. 
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 08-31-2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR, A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MJH and her children. 
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Howard Joshua Gillon in court.  Attorney Melissa Nepomiachi in court for Howard Joshua Gillon.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 8/29/22 @ 2:30p
